title: Manual Samuel – Last Tuesday Edition
description:
Manual Samuel is a hilarious , hand-drawn adventure game with a wild twist. After making a deal with Death, our hero, the spoiled rich-kid Samuel, must survive for 24 hours controlling his entire body manually.
From breathing and blinking to driving and working, all these tasks will fall to you. It won’t be easy, with Death himself tagging along for the ride, you might be in some very deep feces
Using your keyboard or controller, you’ll have to manually breathe, blink , drink, walk, talk and more — one clumsy input at a time. Can you keep Samuel alive, or will he flop his way back to the afterlife?
From getting dressed, driving to work and (checks notes) fighting robots? – Help Samuel navigate his day to ensure he returns to his lavish life and girlfriend
Looking to lose friends or break up with your significant other? Then this mode is perfect for you

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9300 or equivalent
